billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Prohibits the operation of N.Y. city transit authority subways or trains without a conductor on board
summary: Prohibits the operation of NYC transit authority subways or trains without at least one conductor on board; requires a conductor on any subway or train operated by such authority whenever the subway or train has more than two cars attached to the engine.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the New York city transit authority to have at least one conductor on board
